data.text: I'm telling you, with just one or two buddies, I could go on the internet and convince the MAGAs that the entire water supply of Arkansas was secretly tainted with covid vaccine and they'd literally start smashing their kitchen sinks in protest

In just a very few days Arkansas will tally its 10,000th Covid death.

It has been 10 months since the vaccine was opened up to all Arkansans 16+. 

In those 10 months, weâ€™ve logged about 44% of our total Covid deaths. The vast, vast majority of them completely preventable.
